name: Developer Hours Saved Through Automation
description: Calculated from regression testing automation and Jira Assistant usage.

name: Feature Cycle Time Reduction
description: Time from task start to production deployment, comparing pre/post API performance and JUnit adoption

name: Critical Incident Reduction
description: Percentage decrease in P0/P1 incidents for applications after SQUAD onboarding and adopting new quality standards.

name: Faster Incident Recovery (MTTR)
description: Average time to resolve production incidents has been reduced through improved diagnostics and standardized maintenance procedures.

name: Automated Test Coverage
description: Percentage of codebase covered by automated tests, driven by JUnit adoption and new regression frameworks.

name: Developer Community Engagement
description: Total number of participants across all ARC Trainings and Tech Sphere Sessions, fostering a culture of continuous learning.

name: Hackathon Innovators
description: Total number of developers participating in company-wide hackathons to solve business challenges and explore new tech.
